opportunities.problem_statement: Dental practices miss 32% of incoming calls, losing $850-$1,300 per missed call. Staff shortages and peak hours cause voicemails that 86% of new patients never leave.

evidence.signal: 32% of dental calls go unanswered during business hours
Only 14% of new patients leave voicemails
One clinic reduced missed calls by 93% with AI receptionist
60% of dental offices report staff shortages as reason for missed calls

arpu_potential.rationale: Competitors price $49-$4,000/mo. Sweet spot at $299-999 for SMB dental. $599 Professional tier captures most value.

validation.rationale: 32% missed calls is industry-validated. $850+ cost per missed call. 50,000+ businesses adopted AI answering in 2024-2025.

build_speed.rationale: Vapi.ai handles voice AI. Next.js + Supabase for dashboard. 3-5 day build with existing templates.

competition.rationale: Fragmented market. Arini, Viva, Dentina exist but many charge per-minute or enterprise pricing. Room for $599 fixed-price disruptor.

strategic_fit.rationale: Path A Voice AI - highest margin, $599 ARPU, sticky (phone number lock-in), expandable to medical/legal.

blue_ocean_signals: Per-minute pricing creates bill shock - fixed price wins
Many solutions are enterprise-only - SMB underserved
Dental-specific vocabulary and workflows not addressed
opportunities.next_action: Spawn ARCHITECT agent for dental-voice-ai MVP

opportunities.problem_statement: SOC 2 compliance for AI startups costs $50K-$150K and takes 3-6 months. 66% of B2B buyers require it. AI-specific compliance concerns (model training, data leakage) create new complexity.

evidence.signal: Traditional SOC 2 costs $50K-$100K in consulting fees
66% of B2B buyers require SOC 2 before considering a vendor
Comp AI raised $2.6M pre-seed to disrupt SOC 2 market

opportunities.next_action: Queue for build after dental-voice-ai ships

opportunities.problem_statement: Real estate agents miss 80% of leads due to delayed response. First responder wins 78% of deals. 37% of leads remain uncontacted.
opportunities.target_market: Real estate agents in US (1.5M+ agents)

evidence.signal: 80% of leads go cold due to delayed responses
First agent to respond wins 78% of leads

opportunities.problem_statement: Medical practices face same missed call problem as dental but with HIPAA complexity.
opportunities.next_action: Expand dental-voice-ai to medical after validation

selected_for_build.problem: Dental practices miss 32% of calls, losing $850+ per missed opportunity
selected_for_build.solution: AI receptionist that answers every call 24/7, books appointments, and integrates with your schedule
selected_for_build.roi_pitch: At $200/appointment, just 3 additional bookings pay for Professional plan. Most practices see 15-30 new appointments/month.
